item.description:
Wallyball is volleyball played indoors on a racquetball court.  It's a fun and fast-paced game where playing against the walls is part of the field of play.  

Wallyball is competitive but FUN! (Poor sportsmanship will be severely punished by Sheila.)  It's also a great workout that will improve cardio-vascular fitness and muscle tone.

If you can play volleyball, you can play wallyball.  It's indoors so weather is never a problem, and no need to suspend play while someone chases the ball down the beach!

Games are every Thursday evening at Seacoast Sports Club.

Arrive 6:15 pm. Play generally will last until 9pm.

Wallyball is free for Seacoast Sports Club members,

$7 for non-members, payable at the desk. The $7 fee entitles you to full use of the locker rooms, pool, saunas, steam rooms, etc. for the evening, too.

RSVP EARLY in the week!!  Courts have to be reserved and games will be cancelled if a minimum # of players has not signed up.  (No-shows will also be severely punished by Sheila!)

ALWAYS CHECK THE MEETUP SITE for cancelled games before showing up.  Bad weather and last minute emergency change of RSVPs can cause a cancellation.
item.name: Wallyball 3/29/12
